headline: EQT Corporation Announces Expiration and Final Results of Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for EQM Midstream Partners, LP Notes
summary: EQT Corporation (NYSE: EQT) ("EQT" and, collectively with its consolidated subsidiaries, the "Company") today announced the expiration and final results of the previously announced (i) offers by EQT to Eligible Holders (as defined below) to exchange (each, an "Exchange Offer" and collectively, the "Exchange Offers") any and all outstanding notes (the "Existing EQM Notes") issued by EQM Midstream Partners, LP ("EQM"), an indirect wholly owned subsidiary of EQT, for up to $4,541,839,000 aggregate

content.title: EQT Corporation Announces Expiration and Final Results of Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for EQM Midstream Partners, LP Notes
content.summary: EQT Corporation (NYSE: EQT) ("EQT" and, collectively with its consolidated subsidiaries, the "Company") today announced the expiration and final results of the previously announced (i) offers by EQT to Eligible Holders (as defined below) to exchange (each, an "Exchange Offer" and collectively, the "Exchange Offers") any and all outstanding notes (the "Existing EQM Notes") issued by EQM Midstream Partners, LP ("EQM"), an indirect wholly owned subsidiary of EQT, for up to $4,541,839,000 aggregate
